title: PC 5 March - All imperialist countries prepare the war .. it is good to take note of it and organize themselves to fight
content:
an article Of Alessandro warned

According to what reported by the international mass media, high German officers it would have ro accidentally made to leak secrets military at the Russia by means of an audio recording of a video conference meeting.

In the center of the conversation in issue, Berlin's no to the delivery of long -haul missiles Taurus in Kiev, as well as some rumors about the role of Large Britain in the war. Everything then ended up in a service on the network Russian television Russia TODAY. At that point the bomb exploded with Great embarrassment for both Germany and Great Britain.

At the meeting , four officers, including the head of the Air Force German Ingo Gerhartz, discuss the scenarios of deployment for i missiles “ Taurus” in preparation for a meeting with The Minister of Defense Pistorius. The high officers come at the conclusion that a quick delivery and rapid deployment would be States possible only with the participation of German soldiers on the spot, that is, in Ukraine .

Training to the use of “T Aurus ” part Ukrainian soldiers require In fact, he would months. At that point they are discussed Various options to hide the direct involvement of the Bundeswehr on a mission “T Aurus “. In this way, the manufacturer can transmit the data of destination required or these can be delivered by car through Poland.

The bridge which connects the mainland with the Crimea built by the Russians, as well as the ammunition deposits on the peninsula, have been discussed as objectives. You do Then Mention of the presence of British soldiers in Ukraine to help launch British and French cruise missiles. One of the high officers, swallow Gerhartz defines missiles Taurus A "super tool", while others speak of a "single strength" in the skills of the German weapon.

The interception has fallen like a boulder also on German politics.

Thursday evening, in a public event in Dresden, the chancellor Olaf Scholz had justified his refusal to deliver "Taurus" cruise missiles a Kiev and to send German soldiers with unusual clarity. Friday, the Russia made public on the television network Russia Today there registration of the internal meeting of the high officers of the German Air Force held on February 19th. It was not A source for registration of 38 minutes has been specified. The Chancellor Olaf Scholz (SPD) spoke of a "very serious question" During the visit to Rome on Saturday on the occasion of the party assembly European socialist. The German government had just come out with great Embarrassment from the accident in the Red Sea in which one of its own military ship had hit a US Reaper drone after having mistaken it for a Hougian drone.

To complicate things, there are in fact The declarations d German general Ingo Gerhartz who have also swallowed the British armed forces. N El Corso della Conversation intercepted Gerhartz He had discussed the possible delivery of the German missiles Taurus, more precise than the Storm Shadows: " Self We ask us for the delivery methods, I know how the British do. The they do completely in terms of "reach-back". Have several people on site".

Another participant in the call - It is believed to be the general of Brigadier Frank Graefe - would also have added details on the training of Ukrainian troops on German soil, ready to return home. “The right line of action would then be that Great Britain took the command. Imagine the casino If the media discovered it ", it would have admitted l’ senior officer.

Burst The "bomb", German defense minister Boris Pistorius has accused Russian president Vladimir Putin of trying to "Destabilize" the country, following the widespread from Moscow of confidential exchanges between German officers on arms supplies to Ukraine. “It is simply about using this registration for destabilize "and undermine" the unity "of Germany. "The goal is clearly to undermine our unit, to sow division politics at home, and I sincerely hope that Putin does not succeed and that We will remain united, "he explained. But the German Ministry of Defense has had to admit that the registration is authentic and that it has been "Intercepted"

"Yes, of course," said the vice -president of the Bundestag when he was asked by the German newspaper Handelsblatt if the story of the interceptions in the armed forces He could jeopardize cooperation with other partners.

On repercussions in relations with political and military leaders British, the omelette made by the German military leaders is creating Not a few embarrassments and problems.

Tobias Ellwood, former British defense minister, told the tea Guardian that the escape of news is embarrassing for Berlin, even if he has said to the BBC that Russia probably knew about the presence British, given the intensity of its espionage activities.

But this should not "impede that serious conversations between in the diplomatic corridors between Germany, Great Britain and NATO, and which is also discussed for the reason for which this happened ", He added Ellwood.
Great Britain, according to The Guardian, confirmed the presence of a “Small number of military personnel” in Ukraine on Tuesday of last week, even if he did not say what tasks they were carrying out, between the concerns that any potential involvement in Combat can be considered by Moscow as an escalation.

The last one "Accident" of the interceptions of the German military leaders (ai what the demolition should be added by mistake of a drone US in the Red Sea, editor's note), is thus underlined by the newspaper Handasblatt: “All this destroys trust and, unfortunately, yes It inserts quite well in the series of failures of the policy of safety in the question of Russia. There are documents NATO That They went to the Russians during the approval of North Stream 2. There is The case of the double unmasked agent of the BND. And there is revelation last week that the manager of Wirecard , Jan Marsalk, was a Russian spy for years. "

The interception revealed by Russia TODAY has only made evident what NATO is By having been doing for some time, having already sent their military specialists on Ukrainian territory to participate in the war with Russia. There They are only the British but also French, American, Poles, Scandinavi etc. But it also reveals how the obsession with which militarism Back in Germany he is accelerating his newfound protagonist on the international scene, it is already causing a lot of trouble - for Now to your own ally the. It would be better to stop it at birth before they trigger more.
